!Nameless Spirit: It's about time! I've learned where *another me*... no... where the once-me is! I never know what he will do next! I must eliminate him as soon as possible! *Unfortunately, at our current strength we can only put him to sleep*... But when he wakes up, we can put him right back to sleep, and prevent him from amassing more power! It's not perfect, but there's no other way!
